document.discussion_title: Sensex regains 28,000-level, soars 278 points in early trade
document.topic_text: MUMBAI: Taking cues from upbeat global markets, the BSE Sensex recaptured the 28,000-level by surging 278 points and NSE Nifty breached the 8,600-mark in early trade on Friday on continued buying by investors ahead of IIP and inflation data
document.post: MUMBAI: Taking cues from upbeat global markets, the BSE Sensex recaptured the 28,000-level by surging 278 points and NSE Nifty breached the 8,600-mark in early trade on Friday on continued buying by investors ahead of IIP and inflation data
